title: Xian Yu Ge 2nd Season
synopsis:
The carefree Brother Xianyu is still enjoying an ordinary and happy daily life on Yushen Island. The gods from the Nantianmen Group broke the original peace of the island in order to investigate the stolen divine tablets. As unexpected events happened one after another, the mysteries surrounding the "Fish God" and "Seren" slowly unfolded due to Brother Xianyu's unexpected involvement. Faced with racial differences and worldly prejudices, how will Brother Xianyu use his unique way of doing things to pass this test...

(Source: Bilibili, translated)
